name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Spice Pound Cake
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on pound cake. —Ed Levine...

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350°F. Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, a pinch of salt, the cinnamon, clove, and cardamom.
Cream the butter with the dry ingredients; add the eggs, coffee and vanilla. Mix well and turn out into a greased loaf pan.
Bake for 50 minutes; let cool. Chocolate icing is nice, but not necessary.
